episodes.name: Developing our comic
episodes.text: Maybe you are already familiar with the Templars, the Crusaders and even with Assasins Creed (the video game), in this video Sam and Migue will talk more about their comic so you can enjoy it.

episodes.name: Sam and Migue traveled to brazil..did they arrived?
episodes.text: Finally the day came!!!!!!! Sam and Migue didn't believe that the time would finally come, they never thought that they would go to know that place in person, so many times watching it on television and it became reality, who said that you cannot travel in quarantine ???? Obviously you have to take care of yourself, but life keeps going ...

episodes.name: Legion Of Sinners
episodes.text: In the Middle Ages, at the time of the Crusades, the people rise up, the oppressed rebel, the saints and pagans fight against a kingdom and an order that claims to act in the name of heaven, but the fate of this war it will depend on the loyalty of those who have been chosen
